scraped_data.floating-solar: Floating solar PV (FPV) is the installation of solar arrays on bodies of water. Although FPV is in its early stages of deployment in the United States, the versatility, potential benefits, and resource potential have led to growing investment in recent years.
scraped_data.recycling: Developing a pathway to recapture critical materials from PV modules and designing solar panels with durability, reuse, recycling, and resource recovery in mind from the start could reduce waste and preserve resources.
scraped_data.roofing-solar: Building-integrated photovoltaics refer to building materials for rooftops, awnings, windows, and other external surfaces that replace traditional materials and collect energy from the sun.
scraped_data.agrivoltaics: Agrivoltaics pairs solar with agriculture, creating energy and providing space for crops, grazing, and native habitats under and between panels. NLR studies economic and ecological tradeoffs of agrivoltaic systems.
scraped_data.title: Emerging Solar Photovoltaic Market Analysis
